query: Could you create a 7-day travel plan for 2 people, starting in Atlanta and covering 3 cities in California from March 18th to March 24th, 2022? Our budget is set at $10,800 for the trip. We require accommodations with a visitor-friendly policy and would prefer private rooms. Please note, we're not planning to self-drive during our visit.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Sacramento,Fresno,Santa Ana]
